name: God Eater Off Shot: Kota-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 6
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Kota-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 6
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Kota-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 6 is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 24-03-2016. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
God Eater Off Shot: Kota-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 6 is available on PlayStation 4.
